EmailTemplate.name: Product Effective To Date soon to expire
EmailTemplate.subject: Product Effective to – Expiring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Product2.Product_Manager_lookup__c},
The validity date for your product #{!Product2.SAP_Material_Number__c} is expiring in {!Product2.Number_of_days__c} days. Please update your product’s validity end date by performing one of the following actions:
Extend the validity date to a future period if you still wish to sell the remaining inventory Should you not complete this action, the product will automatically be removed from the Online on the product Effective To date + 1 day.
Removing the check boxes "Sell through eCommerce" and "Display to eCommerce" if the product should no longer be offered for sale
Best regards, eCommerce Support Team
